snippet: Workers at the world’s No. 3 platinum producer, Lonmin, began a wildcat strike on Tuesday, prompting fears of a return to the violence that rocked the industry last year.
abstract: South African workers at platinum producer Lonmin begin wildcat strike, halting all mine operations and prompting fears of return to violence that rocked the industry in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Workers at the world’s No. 3 platinum producer, Lonmin, began a wildcat strike on Tuesday, prompting fears of a return to the violence that rocked the industry last year.
